subs.text: This is what my WordLand blog looks like now. Quite a transformation! Sooo pretty. We're going to keep tweaking it up, so it's even more beautiful and more and more useful, but it's going to take some time. As the Supremes used to sing -- you can't hurry love, you just have to wait, la la la la.
One thing I've been waiting to hear about Trump's $400 million jet. We don't need the money.
